meta.title: PT Kaizen Dharma Indonesia - Company Profile

hero.tagline: Your Pathway to Work in Japan
hero.subtitle: We provide end-to-end solutions: from selection and intensive Japanese language & culture training to document processing (COE & Visa) and mobilization to Japan.

about.title: About PT Kaizen Dharma Indonesia
about.businessField: Job Training Services and Placement of Workers to Japan
about.paragraph1: PT Kaizen Dharma Indonesia is engaged in job training services and placement of workers to Japan. We support prospective workers with comprehensive solutions from start to finish.
about.paragraph2: Our services include selection, intensive Japanese language and culture training, processing of legal documents (COE & Visa), and mobilization for departure to Japan—all under one roof.

visionMission.title: Vision & Mission
visionMission.visionText: To build qualified human resources capable of contributing to creating a just, prosperous, peaceful, and dignified society. To make LPK Kaizen Dharma Indonesia a professional and quality institution that produces human resources capable of competing in the global era, interpreting challenges as opportunities in line with the development of science and technology, and meeting community needs through the development of foreign language learning.
visionMission.mission1: To organize professional Japanese language education and training programs.
visionMission.mission2: To conduct educational, consistent, and structured community service activities with reference to foreign language development.
visionMission.mission3: To contribute to the community by opening overseas employment opportunities, thereby assisting the Government in promoting and providing job opportunities.
visionMission.mission4: To provide opportunities for less fortunate communities to become better and more knowledgeable.
visionMission.mission5: To optimize the untapped potential of the community so they can compete in the job market.
